name: Psyvariar Delta
description: Psyvariar Delta is a classic shooter known for the Buzz System, where players level up by grazing enemy fire and chaining Buzz. Also included in this version are 2 HD remakes of the arcade classic Psyvariar Medium Unit and Psyvariar Revision with new additional features.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 3.3GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT730 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
